education.degree: School of electrical and computer engineering applied study

experiences.details: I worked on Reevio old project from DevOps company. I was on practice work about one month. After that I need worked on new project, but that procjet never start.

I have worked on the project ‘’Tempus’’ as a backend developer in JavaScript(NodeJS). We were developing application for Project tracking. Team then 5 people did on that project. We were using Scrum as a project methodology and finish successful project.

experiences.company: School electrical and computer engineering applied studies in Belegrade
experiences.details: On faculty I had some project on C, PHP, Java, Node.js

projects.projectTagline: Tempus is project tracker. All project worked in Node.js on server side, and client side on Angular 2. For database we use Mongodb
Reevio is project for video and image editing. All project worked in Node.js on server side, and client side on jquery. For database we use MySql

Phone store is site for mobile web store where we could see article on store and contact store. Phone store on server side use NodeJS, client side use pure JavaScript with Node.js template. For data base use Postgres SQL
